skills.name: Puny Banner
skills.desc: Transform from Bruce Banner into Hero Hulk.

skills.name: Gamma Ray Gun
skills.desc: Fire with a Gamma Ray Gun.

skills.name: Gamma Grenade
skills.desc: Launch a Gamma Grenade to inflict damage and <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies.

skills.name: Gamma Boost
skills.desc: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which, will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Gamma Fastball
skills.desc: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.

skills.name: Hulk Smash!
skills.desc: Unleash stored gamma energy, transforming from Hero Hulk into Monster Hulk for a limited time period.

skills.name: Heavy Blow
skills.desc: Swing fists forward to punch enemies.

skills.name: Incredible Leap
skills.desc: Hold {Jump} to perform a charged leap that allows Hero Hulk to <Debuff>Knock Down</> flying enemies.

skills.name: Gamma Burst
skills.desc: Emit gamma-ray bursts to inflict damage.

skills.name: Indestructible Guard
skills.desc: Generate gamma shields for Hero Hulk and nearby allies, absorbing and converting damage into energy for <Orange>HULK SMASH!</>

skills.name: Radioactive Lockdown
skills.desc: Emit gamma energy to render enemies immobilized and immune to all ability effects. Using <Orange>Heavy Blow</> or <Orange>Gamma Burst</> will prematurely remove this status.

skills.name: Gamma Boost
skills.desc: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which, will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Gamma Fastball
skills.desc: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.

skills.name: World Breaker
skills.desc: Grab and smash the enemy in front.

skills.name: Heavy Blow
skills.desc: Swing fists forward to punch and <Debuff>launch up</> enemies.

skills.name: Incredible Leap
skills.desc: Hold {Jump} to perform a charged leap that allows Monster Hulk to <Debuff>Knock Down</> flying enemies.

skills.name: Gamma Burst
skills.desc: Emit gamma-ray bursts to inflict damage.

skills.name: Radioactive Lockdown
skills.desc: Emit gamma energy to render enemies immobilized and immune to all ability effects. Using <Orange>Heavy Blow</> or <Orange>Gamma Burst</> will prematurely remove this status.

skills.name: Gamma Boost
skills.desc: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which, will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Gamma Fastball
skills.desc: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.

skills.name: Final Judgement
skills.desc: Unleash two gatling guns and missiles to attack enemies.

skills.name: Adjudication
skills.desc: Fire at enemies with Adjudication, his Automatic Rifle.

skills.name: Deliverance
skills.desc: Fire at enemies with Deliverance, his Shotgun.

skills.name: Scourge Grenade
skills.desc: Throw a smoke grenade forward to <Debuff>Block Enemies' Vision</> and leap backward.

skills.name: Warrior's Gaze
skills.desc: Retain vision of enemies that disappear from view for a short duration.

skills.name: Vantage Connection
skills.desc: Launch a hook to generate a cable that enables Punisher to move rapidly by pressing {Interactive}.

skills.name: Culling Turret
skills.desc: Deploy a Culling Turret that grounds Punisher and blocks damage from the front while dealing massive damage.

skills.name: Infinite Punishment
skills.desc: Rocket Raccoon throws an Ammo Overload Device in the target direction. Upon entering the device's range, {101400} receive the buffs of <Buff>Infinite Ammo</> and <Buff>Faster Firing</>.

skills.name: Cutting-edge Tech
skills.desc: The Punisher upgrades Black Widow's arsenal, adding a Pulse Mode to her Red Room Rifle. While the ability is active, using <Orange>Straight Shooter</> fires a pulse beam that deals piercing damage.

skills.name: Omega Hurricane
skills.desc: Transform into a hurricane to draw in nearby enemies and deal damage.

skills.name: Wind Blade
skills.desc: Launch forward-piercing Wind Blades.

skills.name: Bolt Rush
skills.desc: Unleash a lightning bolt forward.

skills.name: Weather Control
skills.desc: Switch the weather to empower allies: Tornado grants a <Buff>Movement Boost</>; Thunder grants a <Buff>Damage Boost</>.

skills.name: Goddess Boost
skills.desc: Channel the power of the weather to empower Storm: Tornado grants a <Buff>Movement Boost</> and inflicts <Debuff>Slow</> on enemies; Thunder grants a <Buff>Damage Boost</> and summons lightning to inflict damage.

skills.name: Burning Hurricane
skills.desc: When the Human Torch activates <Orange>Supernova</>, Storm can summon an <Orange>Omega Fire</> by selecting a <Orange>Flame Tornado</> with <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>. Likewise, when Storm unleashes <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, the Human Torch can transform it into a <Orange>Burning Hurricane</> with <Orange>Supernova</>. Any <Orange>Flame Tornado</> caught in a <Orange>Burning Hurricane</> will grow in size and damage.

skills.name: Charged Gale
skills.desc: Thor infuses <Orange>Thorforce</> into {101500}{000003}{102200}, granting them an electrifying enhancement. {101501}{102201}

skills.name: Shark Surge
skills.desc: When Storm unleashes her <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, if Jeff the Land Shark has <Orange>It's Jeff!</> ready, he can channel her power to conjure a ferocious <Orange>Jeff-nado</>! Additionally, a <Orange>Jeff-nado</> will form if Jeff encounters Storm's <Orange>Omega Hurricane</> after devouring enemies with <Orange>It's Jeff!</>. Enemies will be drawn into the swirling chaos after enduring sustained damage from the <Orange>Jeff-nado</> for some time.

skills.name: Mystical Missile
skills.desc: Fire Mystical Missiles to heal allies or deal damage to enemies.

skills.name: Regeneration Domain
skills.desc: Use Rune Stones to create a magical field that provides allies <Buff>Healing Over Time</> and converts incoming damage into further healing.

skills.name: Deception
skills.desc: Become <Buff>Invisible</> and conjure an <Orange>Illusion</> to deceive enemies.

skills.name: Doppelganger
skills.cooldown: 2 charges, with each charge taking 12s to recharge
skills.desc: Project an <Orange>Illusion</> that can cast some of Loki's abilities.

skills.name: Devious Exchange
skills.desc: Swap with the selected <Orange>Illusion</>.

skills.name: God Of Mischief
skills.desc: Shapeshift into a targeted ally or enemy hero and use all their abilities except any of their Team-Up Abilities.

skills.name: Backstab
skills.desc: Pull out a dagger to stab enemies, dealing extra damage when attacking an enemy from behind.

skills.name: Laufeyson Reborn
skills.desc: When Hela lands a final hit in defeating an enemy, she can instantly resurrect {101600}{000003}{103900} in the respawn phase, or grant them <Buff>Bonus Health</> if they are still alive.

skills.name: Fire Cluster
skills.desc: Launch forward a cluster of splitting fireballs.

skills.name: Plasma Body
skills.desc: HOLD {Ability2} to enter a state of <Buff>accelerated ascent</>.

skills.name: Blazing Blast
skills.desc: Launch a fireball to deal damage or create a <Orange>Flame Field</> at the targeted area, dealing damage to enemies within.

skills.name: Flaming Meteor
skills.desc: Dive towards the ground, dealing damage to enemies. This will also detonate any <Orange>Flame Fields</> hit and grant you <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Pyro-prison
skills.desc: When 2 or more  <Orange>Flame Fields</> exist, connect them to form a fire wall that deals one-off high damage to enemies that pass through the wall, or continuous burning damage if the wall exists in an enclosed area.

skills.name: Supernova
skills.desc: Explode with cosmic fire to deal damage to enemies within range and enter <Orange>Supernova</> state. While in Supernova state, <Orange>Blazing Blast</> will transform into <Orange>Flame Tornado</>, and <Orange>Plasma Body</> can be activated without any cost.

skills.name: Omega Fire
skills.desc: When the Human Torch activates <Orange>Supernova</>, Storm can summon an <Orange>Omega Fire</> by selecting a <Orange>Flame Tornado</> with <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>. Likewise, when Storm unleashes <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, the Human Torch can transform it into a <Orange>Burning Hurricane</> with <Orange>Supernova</>. Any <Orange>Flame Tornado</> caught in a <Orange>Burning Hurricane</> will grow in size and damage.

skills.name: United Siblings
skills.desc: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team. This formidable force bolsters Human Torch, The Thing, and Mister Fantastic, granting damage resistance. Once activated, they can continually generate <Buff>Bonus Health</>, making up for lost Health.

skills.name: Eye Of Agamotto
skills.desc: Separate nearby enemies' <Orange>Souls</> from their bodies. Damage dealt to these <Orange>Souls</> is transferred to their physical bodies.

skills.name: Daggers Of Denak
skills.desc: Cast Daggers of Denak forward.

skills.name: Pentagram Of Farallah
skills.desc: Open portals between two locations, enabling all units to travel through them.

skills.name: Shield Of The Seraphim
skills.desc: Create a protective barrier against damage.

skills.name: Maelstrom Of Madness
skills.desc: Release <Orange>Dark Magic</> to deal damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Price Of Magic
skills.desc: <Orange>Dark Magic</> accumulates with every hit on an enemy. If <Orange>Dark Magic</> peaks for too long, Doctor Strange will be cursed with <Debuff>Anti-Heal</>.

skills.name: Cloak Of Levitation
skills.desc: Ascend and then enter a brief state of sustained flight.

skills.name: Gamma Maelstrom
skills.desc: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which, will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Enchanted Enhancement
skills.desc: Doctor Strange shares his arcane mastery, replacing Scarlet Witch's <Orange>Chthonian Burst</> with <Orange>Mystic Burst</> upon activation. Hold down the attack button to unleash a rapid, relentless salvo of magical missiles in the target direction.

skills.name: Soul Resurgence
skills.desc: Release energy around her while moving, providing <Buff>Healing Over Time</> and <Buff>Movement Boosts</> for surrounding allies. Excess healing converts to <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Life Energy Blast
skills.desc: Fire an energy thorn and regain one <Orange>Life Orb</> after a critical hit.

skills.name: Healing Flower
skills.desc: Consume <Orange>Life Orbs</> to grant allies <Buff>Healing Over Time</>.

skills.name: Spore Slumber
skills.desc: Throw a spore to <Debuff>Sedate</> the nearest enemy.

skills.name: Allied Inspiration
skills.desc: Consume <Orange>Life Orbs</> to grant allies a <Buff>Damage Boost</>.

skills.name: Nature's Favor
skills.desc: Receive a <Buff>Movement Boost</> when not injured and <Orange>Healing Over Time</> when consuming <Buff>Life Orbs</>.

skills.name: Natural Anger
skills.desc: Consume <Orange>Life Orbs</> to grant herself a <Buff>Damage Boost</>.

skills.name: Nature's Soul
skills.desc: Adam Warlock enhances the rebirth power of {104300}{000003}{102000}, granting them the power of cocooned revival.

skills.name: Skyward Leap
skills.desc: Perform a double jump in the direction of movement.

skills.name: Archer's Focus
skills.desc: Aim at an enemy to improve focus, enhancing the damage inflicted by <Orange>Piercing Arrow</>.

skills.name: Piercing Arrow
skills.desc: Shoot a powerful arrow.

skills.name: Ronin Slash
skills.desc: Swing the wakizashi to strike frontal enemies, deflecting all incoming <Orange>projectiles</>.

skills.name: Blast Arrow
skills.desc: Shoot three explosive arrows.

skills.name: Hypersonic Arrow
skills.desc: Shoot a Hypersonic Arrow, dealing two instances of damage to enemies in its path and inflicting them with <Debuff>Slow</>. This ability can <Debuff>Knock Down</> flying heroes.

skills.name: Crescent Slash
skills.desc: Unsheathe a katana and slash forward, <Debuff>Launching Up</> hit enemies.

skills.name: Hunter's Sight
skills.desc: Capture <Orange>Afterimages</> of enemies in his view. Damage dealt to an <Orange>Afterimage</> is transferred to the corresponding enemy.

skills.name: Supersensory Vision
skills.desc: Hawkeye can share his Hunter's Sight with Black Widow, enabling her to catch sight of and damage afterimages of enemies.

skills.name: Ice Arrow
skills.desc: With the blessing of Luna Snow, Hawkeye is imbued with the ice energy, allowing him to fire <Orange>Ice Arrows</> that pierce through enemies! If an <Orange>Ice Arrow</> travels beyond a certain distance, it <Debuff>Stuns</> any enemy it hits. If it strikes before reaching that distance, it instead <Debuff>Slows</> the target. The farther the <Orange>Ice Arrow</> flies, the greater its damage.

skills.name: Sentinel Strike
skills.desc: Get up close to strike enemies. Landing the second hit enables a shield throw that can ricochet four times.

skills.name: Living Legend
skills.desc: Raise the shield to deflect incoming <Orange>Projectiles</>, sending them ricocheting in random directions.

skills.name: Leading Dash
skills.desc: Boost speed and enable <Orange>Fearless Leap</> to leap into the air.

skills.name: Super-soldier Slam
skills.desc: Slam down from the sky onto the targeted area, <Debuff>Launching Up</> enemies.

skills.name: Vibranium Energy Saw
skills.desc: Hurl the energy-charged shield to strike enemies in a path.

skills.name: Freedom Charge
skills.desc: Shield held high, carve a path forward, granting both himself and allies along the path continuous <Buff>Bonus Health</> and <Buff>Movement Boosts</>. Using <Orange>Living Legend</> and <Orange>Leading Dash</> while this ability is active can <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies.

skills.name: Charged Aegis
skills.desc: Thor infuses <Orange>Thorforce</> into {101500}{000003}{102200}, granting them an electrifying enhancement. {101501}{102201}

skills.name: Liberty Rush
skills.desc: Raise the shield and charge forward.

skills.name: Captain's Spirit
skills.desc: Inspired by Captain America's resolve, Winter Soldier can leap to the aid of a designated ally, slamming the ground with his mechanical arm to damage nearby foes and grant <Buff>Bonus Health</> to allies within range. Captain America and Winter Soldier can interact with each other once both parties confirm. The duo then collides and unleashes a shockwave that damages and <Debuff>slows</> enemies.

skills.name: Wild Crawl
skills.desc: Hold {Jump} to run on a wall.

skills.name: Bombard Mode
skills.desc: Fire energy projectiles that deal damage.

skills.name: Jetpack Dash
skills.cooldown: 2 charges, with each charge taking 6s to recharge
skills.desc: Dash forward.

skills.name: B.r.b.
skills.cooldown: 45s. You can reclaim the beacon by pressing E. When reclaimed, the cooldown will be reduced based on the beacon's remaining health. If you reclaim a full-health beacon, the minimum cooldown will be 5s
skills.desc: Deploy a Battle Rebirth Beacon that revives a fallen ally and periodically produces <Orange>armor packs</> and <Orange>rocket jet packs</>.

skills.name: C.y.a.
skills.desc: Deploy a Cosmic Yarn Amplifier that grants allies a <Buff>Damage Boost</>, while continuously providing them with <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Repair Mode
skills.desc: Shoot bouncing spheres to heal allies. Directly hitting an ally provides extra healing.

skills.name: Flying Ace
skills.desc: Hold {Jump} to fall slowly.

skills.name: OLD FRIENDS
skills.desc: Rocket Raccoon and Jeff can ride on Groot's shoulders, receiving Damage Reduction.

skills.name: Nightsword Thorn
skills.desc: Throw Nightsword Thorns.

skills.name: Nastrond Crowstorm
skills.desc: Defeating an enemy will generate a Nastrond Crow, exploding after a duration.

skills.name: Piercing Night
skills.desc: Fire multiple Nightsword Thorns that detonate after a delay.

skills.name: Astral Flock
skills.desc: Transform into a Nastrond Crow to glide forth, press again to undo the transformation.

skills.name: Soul Drainer
skills.desc: Project an explosive Hel sphere to <Debuff>Stun</> nearby enemies and pull them into the blast zone.

skills.name: Goddess Of Death
skills.desc: Soar into the sky and unleash Nastrond Crows from each hand at will.

skills.name: Hel's Descent
skills.desc: HOLD {Jump} to fall slowly.

skills.name: Queen Of Hel
skills.desc: When Hela lands a final hit in defeating an enemy, she can instantly resurrect {101600}{000003}{103900} in the respawn phase, or grant them <Buff>Bonus Health</> if they are still alive.

skills.name: Lightforce Dagger
skills.desc: Unleash a bouncing <Orange>Lightforce Dagger</> to damage enemies and heal nearby allies.

skills.name: Dagger Storm
skills.desc: Launch a volley of daggers, creating a <Buff>Healing-Over-Time</> field in the impact area.

skills.name: Shadow's Embrace
skills.desc: Switch to Cloak.

skills.name: Light Explosion
skills.desc: Deploy a Veil of Lightforce to heal allies upon touch and grant them a <Buff>Healing Boost</>.

skills.name: Darkforce Cloak
skills.desc: Inflict continuous damage to an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Teleportation
skills.desc: Enshroud nearby allies in the Darkforce Dimension and grant them <Buff>Phased</>, making them untargetable and invisible to enemies and granting them a <Buff>Movement Boost</>.

skills.name: Terror Cape
skills.desc: Deploy a Veil of Darkforce to damage enemies upon touch, applying <Debuff>Blind</> to narrow their sight and <Debuff>Vulnerability</> to amplify damage received.

skills.name: Eternal Bond
skills.desc: Perform four rapid dashes, healing allies and damaging enemies along the path.

skills.name: From Shadow To Light
skills.desc: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into {103000}{000003}{104400} to create a Light & Dark Realm where {103000}{000003}{104400} can become <Buff>invisible</>. {104401}

skills.name: Lightforce Dagger
skills.desc: Unleash a bouncing <Orange>Lightforce Dagger</> to damage enemies and heal nearby allies.

skills.name: Dagger Storm
skills.desc: Launch a volley of daggers, creating a <Buff>Healing-Over-Time</> field in the impact area.

skills.name: Shadow's Embrace
skills.desc: Switch to Cloak.

skills.name: Light Explosion
skills.desc: Deploy a Veil of Lightforce to heal allies upon touch and grant them a <Buff>Healing Boost</>.

skills.name: Eternal Bond
skills.desc: Perform four rapid dashes, healing allies and damaging enemies along the path.

skills.name: From Shadow To Light
skills.desc: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into {103000}{000003}{104400} to create a Light & Dark Realm where {103000}{000003}{104400} can become <Buff>invisible</>. {104401}

skills.name: Darkforce Cloak
skills.desc: Inflict continuous damage to an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Teleportation
skills.desc: Enshroud nearby allies in the Darkforce Dimension and grant them <Buff>Phased</>, making them untargetable and invisible to enemies and granting them a <Buff>Movement Boost</>.

skills.name: Light's Embrace
skills.desc: Switch to Dagger.

skills.name: Terror Cape
skills.desc: Deploy a Veil of Darkforce to damage enemies upon touch, applying <Debuff>Blind</> to narrow their sight and <Debuff>Vulnerability</> to amplify damage received.

skills.name: Eternal Bond
skills.desc: Perform four rapid dashes, healing allies and damaging enemies along the path.

skills.name: From Shadow To Light
skills.desc: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into {103000}{000003}{104400} to create a Light & Dark Realm where {103000}{000003}{104400} can become <Buff>invisible</>. {104401}

skills.name: Panther's Cunning
skills.desc: Deal higher damage when at low Health.

skills.name: Subtle Step
skills.desc: HOLD {Jump} to run on a wall; perform a jump after detaching from the wall.

skills.name: Vibranium Claws
skills.desc: Slice Vibranium Claws forward.

skills.name: Spinning Kick
skills.desc: Spiral forward and attach a <Orange>Vibranium Mark</> to hit enemies.

skills.name: Spear Toss
skills.desc: Toss a Vibranium energy spear forward, creating a <Orange>Vibranium Force Field</> and attaching a <Orange>Vibranium Mark</> to enemies in its radius.

skills.name: Spirit Rend
skills.desc: Lunge forward and deal damage to enemies. <Orange>Vibranium Mark</> produces <Buff>Bonus Health</> and refreshes the ability.

skills.name: Bast's Descent
skills.desc: Summon Bast, pouncing forward, dealing damage and attaching a <Orange>Vibranium Mark</> to hit enemies, while refreshing <Orange>Spirit Rend</>.

skills.name: Wakandan Master
skills.desc: Magik opens a portal that anchors an exit at its range limit or upon reactivation. {102600}{000001}{104900}{000001}{000003}{104800} can use the portal.

skills.name: Strangling Prison
skills.desc: Fire a massive vine cluster that pulls nearby enemies to its center and <Debuff>Imprisons</> them.

skills.name: Vine Strike
skills.desc: Launch vines to attack enemies.

skills.name: Spore Bomb
skills.desc: Throw an explosive Spore Bomb that splits into multiple small explosive spores.

skills.name: Thornlash Wall
skills.cooldown: 2 charges, with each charge taking 6s to recharge
skills.desc: Target a location and grow a Thornlash Wall. When <Orange>Awakened</>, it strikes nearby enemies attacked by Groot and his allies.

skills.name: Ironwood Wall
skills.desc: Target a location and grow an Ironwood Wall. When the wall is <Orange>Awakened</>, damage dealt by Groot and nearby allies grants Groot <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Flora Colossus
skills.desc: Wooden walls near Groot will <Orange>Awaken</>, activating an extra effect. Press {PrimaryAttack} while building a wooden wall to continue building additional walls.

skills.name: Friendly Shoulder
skills.desc: {104700}{000003}{102300} can ride on Groot's shoulders, receiving <Buff>Damage Reduction</>.

skills.name: Furious Flora
skills.desc: Perform a combo with his arms, and the third strike will slightly <Debuff>Launch Up</> the hit enemy airborne.

skills.name: Encephalo-ray
skills.desc: Unleash a burning energy beam.

skills.name: Imperative: Firewall
skills.desc: Summon drones to grant <Orange>Bonus Health</> to allies within range, centered on himself and the ally marked by <Buff>Imperative: Patch</>.

skills.name: Dynamic Flight
skills.desc: Fly quickly in the direction of movement and then enter an <Buff>Accelerated</> state.

skills.name: Imperative: Patch
skills.desc: Command a giant drone to follow an ally, constantly healing allies within its radius, with more healing for the designated ally.

skills.name: Rage Of Ultron
skills.desc: Summon Ultron Drones to fire Encephalo-Rays, damaging enemies or healing allies.

skills.name: Nano Ray
skills.desc: Iron Man uses nanotechnology to upgrade Ultron's arsenal, enhancing his <Orange>Encephalo-Ray</> to <Orange>Nano Ray</>. During its active phase, Ultron fires an unstoppable Nano Ray straight ahead that pierces through all characters, delivering massive damage to enemies while simultaneously restoring health to allies.

skills.name: Soulsword
skills.desc: Slash forward with the Soulsword.

skills.name: Magik Slash
skills.desc: Strike forward an air slash.

skills.name: Limbo's Might
skills.desc: Convert damage inflicted on enemies into <Buff>Bonus Health</> to herself.

skills.name: Stepping Discs
skills.desc: Jump through a Stepping Disc, teleporting a short distance in the direction of movement. Become <Buff>Invincible</> while teleporting.

skills.name: Eldritch Whirl
skills.desc: Spin while swinging the Soulsword after exiting a <Orange>Stepping Disc</>.

skills.name: Demon's Rage
skills.desc: Summon a Limbo demon that attacks enemies after exiting a <Orange>Stepping Disc</>.

skills.name: Umbral Incursion
skills.desc: Dash forward and <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies airborne.

skills.name: Darkchild
skills.desc: Transform into Darkchild, gaining enhancements to all her abilities.

skills.name: Disc Master
skills.desc: When Magik is on the field, {102600} can tap into Limbo to rewind a few seconds back to a previous position; after passing through Limbo, {102600} will gain <Buff>Bonus Health</> based on missing health.

skills.name: Soulsword
skills.desc: Slash forward with the Soulsword.

skills.name: Magik Slash
skills.desc: Strike forward an air slash.

skills.name: Limbo's Might
skills.desc: Convert damage inflicted on enemies into <Buff>Bonus Health</> to herself.

skills.name: Stepping Discs
skills.desc: Jump through a Stepping Disc, teleporting a short distance in the direction of movement. Become <Buff>Invincible</> while teleporting.

skills.name: Eldritch Whirl
skills.desc: Spin while swinging the Soulsword after exiting a <Orange>Stepping Disc</>.

skills.name: Demon's Rage
skills.desc: Summon a Limbo demon that attacks enemies after exiting a <Orange>Stepping Disc</>.

skills.name: Umbral Incursion
skills.desc: Dash forward and <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies airborne.

skills.name: Disc Master
skills.desc: When Magik is on the field, {102600} can tap into Limbo to rewind a few seconds back to a previous position; after passing through Limbo, {102600} will gain <Buff>Bonus Health</> based on missing health.

skills.name: Crescent Dart
skills.desc: Unleash Crescent Darts forward that can bounce between enemies and <Orange>Ankhs</>, dealing damage to enemies.

skills.name: Moon Blade
skills.desc: Launch forward a Moon Blade that can bounce between enemies and <Orange>Ankhs</>, dealing damage to enemies while granting you <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Ancient Ankh
skills.desc: Fire an <Orange>Ankh</> to <Debuff>Knock</> enemies within its radius airborne towards the center.

skills.name: Moonlight Hook
skills.desc: Launch a frontal grappling hook that pulls Moon Knight towards it.

skills.name: Night Glider
skills.desc: Enter a gliding state.

skills.name: Rising Leap
skills.desc: Perform a double jump.

skills.name: Hand Of Khonshu
skills.desc: Open a portal that allows Khonshu to bombard enemies with his talons.

skills.name: Full Moon
skills.desc: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into {103000}{000003}{104400} to create a Light & Dark Realm where {103000}{000003}{104400} can become <Buff>invisible</>. {104401}

skills.name: Triple Eclipse
skills.desc: Perform a combo with his truncheon, and the third strike will slightly <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies.

skills.name: Smooth Skate
skills.desc: Keep moving forward to start ice skating and enable higher jumps.

skills.name: Light & Dark Ice
skills.desc: Fire ice shots that damage enemies or heal allies.

skills.name: Ice Arts
skills.desc: Fire ice shards for a short duration, damaging enemies or healing allies while restoring her own Health.

skills.name: Absolute Zero
skills.desc: Cast a clump of ice to <Debuff>Freeze</> the hit enemy and restore Health. Landing a hit grants <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Share The Stage
skills.desc: Attach <Orange>Idol Aura</> to an ally. Allies with <Orange>Idol Aura</> also restore Health when Luna Snow is healing others.

skills.name: Fate Of Both Worlds
skills.desc: Take center stage and start dancing! Toggle between two performances: Heal allies or grant them <Buff>Damage Boost</>.

skills.name: Icy Disco
skills.desc: Luna Snow infuses ice energy into {104700}, who then can tap into the ice energy to power up abilities at will.

skills.name: Frozen Chi
skills.desc: Iron Fist channels the Chi of Shou-Lao into Luna Snow, transforming her ice power into a Chi-infused frosty ring that radiates from her. This ring can launch up enemies with chilling damage and applies a slowing effect, while simultaneously healing her allies.

skills.name: Cryo Heart
skills.desc: Automatically restore Health when casting <Orange>Ice Arts</> or <Orange>Absolute Zero</>.

skills.name: Winter's Chill
skills.desc: With the blessing of Luna Snow, Hawkeye is imbued with the ice energy, allowing him to fire <Orange>Ice Arrows</> that pierce through enemies! If an <Orange>Ice Arrow</> travels beyond a certain distance, it <Debuff>Stuns</> any enemy it hits. If it strikes before reaching that distance, it instead <Debuff>Slows</> the target. The farther the <Orange>Ice Arrow</> flies, the greater its damage.

skills.name: Burst Acorn
skills.desc: Shoot bouncing Burst Acorns.

skills.name: Tail Bounce
skills.desc: Rocket upwards with a bounce of her tail.

skills.name: Mammal Bond
skills.desc: Reload Burst Acorns and can use an ability without cooldown once in a short duration.

skills.name: Squirrel Blockade
skills.desc: Launch an acorn to unleash Squirrel Guards, <Debuff>Imprisoning</> the first hit enemy.

skills.name: Unbeatable Squirrel Tsunami
skills.desc: Summon a horde of squirrels to charge forward, dealing damage while bouncing against structures.

skills.name: Webbed Acorn
skills.desc: Spider-Man gives Squirrel Girl a web bomb. She can launch it to unleash an explosion upon contact with the environment or an enemy, briefly <Debuff>Immobilizing</> and damaging enemies caught in the blast.

skills.name: Rapid Fire
skills.desc: Strike with the enhanced electric batons.

skills.name: Edge Dancer
skills.desc: Unleash a spinning kick to <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies. Landing the hit will allow her to zip to the target with a grappling hook for a second kick.

skills.name: Straight Shooter
skills.desc: Unleash the Spinning Kick to forcefully repel nearby foes. Afterward, target an enemy to deploy a grappling hook, drawing yourself towards them and launching them up upon impact.

skills.name: Fleet Foot
skills.desc: Dash forward and enable a powerful jump.

skills.name: Electro-plasma Explosion
skills.desc: Switch the Red Room Rifle to Destruction mode and unleash an electro-plasma blast, damaging enemies within range and inflicting them with <Debuff>Vulnerability</>. Additionally, leave a plasma pool on the ground to <Debuff>Slow</> nearby enemies.

skills.name: Red Room Rifle
skills.desc: Unleash a barrage of bullets with the Red Room Rifle.

skills.name: Supersensory Hunt
skills.desc: Hawkeye can share his Hunter's Sight with Black Widow, enabling her to catch sight of and damage afterimages of enemies.

skills.name: LION'S LAUNCH
skills.desc: Attack with the Red Room Rifle.

skills.name: FEROCIOUS THROW
skills.desc: Switch the Red Room Rifle to Sniper mode to fire high-energy rounds.

skills.name: FLEET FOOT
skills.desc: Dash forward.

skills.name: LION DANCER
skills.desc: Unleash a spinning kick to <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies and cause them to lose the ball. This ability can only be used when not in possession of the ball.

skills.name: Pulse Rifle
skills.desc: The Punisher upgrades Black Widow's arsenal, adding a Pulse Mode to her Red Room Rifle. While the ability is active, using <Orange>Straight Shooter</> fires a pulse beam that deals piercing damage.

skills.name: Repulsor Blast
skills.desc: Fire nano pulse cannons forward.

skills.name: Unibeam
skills.desc: Fire a unibeam forward.

skills.name: Hyper-velocity
skills.desc: Activate <Orange>Hyper-Velocity</> state for swift forward flight.

skills.name: Micro-missile Barrage
skills.desc: When <Orange>Hyper-Velocity</> or <Orange>Armor Overdrive</> is used, Iron Man can launch a missile bombardment.

skills.name: Armor Overdrive
skills.desc: Activate <Orange>Armor Overdrive</> state, enhancing damage of <Orange>Repulsor Blast</> and <Orange>Unibeam</>, while also granting <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Invincible Pulse Cannon
skills.desc: Fire a devastating pulse cannon in the targeted direction, delivering catastrophic damage to the targeted area upon impact.

skills.name: Gamma Overdrive
skills.desc: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which, will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Nano Tech
skills.desc: Iron Man uses nanotechnology to upgrade Ultron's arsenal, enhancing his <Orange>Encephalo-Ray</> to <Orange>Nano Ray</>. During its active phase, Ultron fires an unstoppable Nano Ray straight ahead that pierces through all characters, delivering massive damage to enemies while simultaneously restoring health to allies.

skills.name: Alien Biology
skills.desc: PRESS{Jump} to wall crawl, and while crawling, PRESS{PrimaryAttack}to sprint.

skills.name: Dark Predation
skills.desc: Unleash tentacles forward to attack enemies.

skills.name: Frenzied Arrival
skills.desc: Dash to the target location from a certain height. Upon landing, damage nearby enemies, <Debuff>Launching Them Up</> towards the landing point.

skills.name: Cellular Corrosion
skills.desc: Unleash tentacles to <Debuff>Slow</> enemies within reach. Enemies unable to break free in time will suffer damage.

skills.name: Venom Swing
skills.desc: Launch webbing forward, allowing for a singular swing in the desired direction.

skills.name: Symbiotic Resilience
skills.desc: Generate <Buff>Bonus Health</> against damage. The lower Venom's Health, the greater the <Buff>Bonus Health</> generated.

skills.name: Feast Of The Abyss
skills.desc: Burrow underground for free movement. After a duration or by pressing {PrimaryAttack}, devour enemies above to deal damage based on the enemy's current health and generate equivalent <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Touch Of Klyntar
skills.desc: Venom shares a part of his symbiotes with {103600}{000003}{104200}, activating their symbiote abilities. {103600}{000003}{104200} can convert the symbiotes into explosive spikes that inflict harm on nearby enemies and relentlessly drive them back.

skills.name: Healing Tendrils
skills.desc: Venom shares a part of his symbiotes with Jeff the Land Shark. When using the Team-Up Ability in either his normal state or during <Orange>Hide and Seek</>, Jeff extends symbiote tendrils to nearby allies, linking with them. Linked teammates receive <Buff>continuous healing</>. When the ability reaches its maximum duration, all linked allies gain a large burst of healing, with excess healing being converted into <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Thwip And Flip
skills.desc: Perform a double jump.

skills.name: Spider-power
skills.desc: Swing fists forward to strike, dealing extra damage to the enemy with a <Orange>Spider-Tracer</>.

skills.name: Web-cluster
skills.desc: Shoot a Web-Cluster that deals damage and attaches a <Orange>Spider-Tracer</> to the hit enemy.

skills.name: Get Over Here!
skills.desc: Shoot webbing to reel in the hit enemy. If the enemy is tagged with a <Orange>Spider-Tracer</>, Spider-Man will get pulled to them instead.

skills.name: Spectacular Spin
skills.desc: Launch Web-Clusters all around to damage and <Debuff>Stun</> enemies.

skills.name: Spider-sense
skills.desc: Give a warning of enemies that have been around.

skills.name: Web-swing
skills.desc: Shoot a strand of webbing to swing.

skills.name: Wall Crawl
skills.desc: PRESS {Jump} to crawl on vertical surfaces, and PRESS {PrimaryAttack} to run on them.

skills.name: Amazing Combo
skills.desc: Launch an enemy upward, dealing extra damage to the enemy with a <Orange>Spider-Tracer</>.

skills.name: Suit Expulsion
skills.desc: Venom shares a part of his symbiotes with {103600}{000003}{104200}, activating their symbiote abilities. {103600}{000003}{104200} can convert the symbiotes into explosive spikes that inflict harm on nearby enemies and relentlessly drive them back.

skills.name: Extra Web-fluid
skills.desc: Spider-Man gives Squirrel Girl a web bomb. She can launch it to unleash an explosion upon contact with the environment or an enemy, briefly <Debuff>Immobilizing</> and damaging enemies caught in the blast.

skills.name: Magnetic Descent
skills.desc: Hold {Jump} to fall slowly.

skills.name: Iron Volley
skills.desc: Fire a volley of magnetic orbs forward. The range of the resulting explosion increases based on distance flown.

skills.name: Mag-cannon
skills.cooldown: No cooldown, but the ability can only be activated when the Iron Ring has at least one charge
skills.desc: Convert the iron rings on Magneto's back into a Mag-Cannon and launch a metallic mass forward. Higher stacks of rings increase damage, and full stacks <Debuff>Knock Back</> enemies.

skills.name: Metallic Curtain
skills.desc: Change the magnetic field around to form a metallic curtain, blocking all incoming <Orange>Projectiles</>.

skills.name: Metal Bulwark
skills.cooldown: 12s, and sharing cooldown with Iron Bulwark
skills.desc: Conjure a metal shield around a chosen ally. Damage taken will transform into rings on Magneto's back.

skills.name: Meteor M
skills.desc: Draw in all materials around to forge an iron meteor that deals massive damage upon impact. Absorbing enemy <Orange>Projectiles</> can enhance the meteor's power, yet overloading will cause it to self-destruct.

skills.name: Metallic Fusion
skills.desc: Scarlet Witch can infuse Chaos Energy into Magneto to enchant his greatsword. Upon receiving the Chaos Energy, Magneto can unleash its full force, striking down enemies with his enchanted greatsword.

skills.name: Iron Bulwark
skills.cooldown: 12s, and sharing cooldown with Metal Bulwark
skills.desc: Conjure an iron shield around himself. Damage taken will transform into rings on Magneto's back.

skills.name: Magnetic Resonance
skills.desc: Emma Frost can form a mental link with Magneto and Psylocke, calling on her to create illusory projections. When together, Emma Frost will create a Mental Projection of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities on its own.

skills.name: Telekinesis
skills.desc: HOLD {Jump} to fall slowly.

skills.name: Chaos Control
skills.desc: Unleash Chaos Magic on enemies to deal damage and restore <Orange>Chaos Energy</>

skills.name: Chthonian Burst
skills.desc: Consume <Orange>Chaos Energy</> to fire explosive magic missiles, damaging enemies.

skills.name: Dark Seal
skills.desc: Land a hit on a target or the scene, or press again to generate a Force Field that periodically <Debuff>Stuns</> enemies within range.

skills.name: Mystic Projection
skills.desc: Enter the <Orange>Phased</> state for free-flight. Press {Ability2} to exit early.

skills.name: Reality Erasure
skills.desc: Engage in free-flight while charging energy, then unleash it to deal massive damage.

skills.name: Chaotic Bond
skills.desc: Scarlet Witch can infuse Chaos Energy into Magneto to enchant his greatsword. Upon receiving the Chaos Energy, Magneto can unleash its full force, striking down enemies with his enchanted greatsword.

skills.name: Sorcery Surge
skills.desc: Doctor Strange shares his arcane mastery, replacing Scarlet Witch's <Orange>Chthonian Burst</> with <Orange>Mystic Burst</> upon activation. Hold down the attack button to unleash a rapid, relentless salvo of magical missiles in the target direction.

skills.name: Thorforce
skills.desc: Consume <Orange>Thorforce</> to gain <Buff>Bonus Health</>. Landing <Orange>Mjlnir Bash</> on an enemy instantly recharges <Orange>Thorforce</>.

skills.name: Mjlnir Bash
skills.desc: Wield Mjlnir to strike enemies. When <Orange>Awakened</>, Thor can launch lightning arc waves to deal damage.

skills.name: Hammer Throw
skills.desc: Throw Mjolnir forward which then returns. Restore <Orange>Thorforce</> upon hit.

skills.name: Lightning Realm
skills.desc: Summon lightning to restore <Orange>Thorforce</> based on the number of hit enemies.

skills.name: Storm Surge
skills.desc: HOLD to spin Mjlnir before dashing forward and <Debuff>Knocking Back</> enemies.

skills.name: Awakening Rune
skills.desc: Consume <Orange>Thorforce</> to enter the <Orange>Awakened</> state, granting <Buff>Bonus Health</> and enhancing Mjlnir Bash.

skills.name: God Of Thunder
skills.desc: Soar upwards and smite the ground after charging for a duration, inflicting damage on enemies within range.

skills.name: Odinson Reborn
skills.desc: When Hela lands a final hit in defeating an enemy, she can instantly resurrect {101600}{000003}{103900} in the respawn phase, or grant them <Buff>Bonus Health</> if they are still alive.

skills.name: Thunderous Deity
skills.desc: Thor infuses <Orange>Thorforce</> into {101500}{000003}{102200}, granting them an electrifying enhancement. {101501}{102201}

skills.name: Elastic Strength
skills.desc: Using abilities generates <Orange>Elasticity</>. Reaching full <Orange>Elasticity</> triggers an Inflated state that grants <Buff>Shield</> and enhanced damage.

skills.name: Stretch Punch
skills.desc: Stretch out a forward punch to attack enemies.

skills.name: Distended Grip
skills.desc: Extend arms forward to entangle an enemy, then press {PrimaryAttack} to pull the hit enemy toward you, or select and yank another enemy, <Debuff>knocking them airborne</> against each other.

skills.name: Flexible Elongation
skills.desc: Gain a <Buff>Shield</>, select a target, and dash towards them, dealing damage to enemies and granting a <Buff>Shield</> to allies.

skills.name: Reflexive Rubber
skills.desc: Stretch body to absorb damage before launching stored damage in the targeted direction.

skills.name: Brainiac Bounce
skills.desc: Leap upward and smash the ground, <Debuff>slowing</> enemies within range. Can leap again upon landing a hit.

skills.name: Wedded Harmony
skills.desc: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team. This formidable force bolsters Human Torch, The Thing, and Mister Fantastic, granting damage resistance. Once activated, they can continually generate <Buff>Bonus Health</>, making up for lost Health.

skills.name: Ceaseless Charge
skills.desc: Roterstern reloads automatically while the bionic arm is in action, granting the Winter Soldier <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Roterstern
skills.desc: Fire explosive rounds with his blaster, Roterstern, damaging the target hit and enemies behind them.

skills.name: Bionic Hook
skills.desc: Charge up and launch a hook with his bionic arm, reeling in the first target hit and enemies lurking behind.

skills.name: Trooper's Fist
skills.desc: Dash forward, seizing enemies along the path, and <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies in front at the end of the dash.

skills.name: Tainted Voltage
skills.desc: Charge up and launch a powerful electrical punch with the bionic arm in the target direction, dealing damage to enemies within range and <Debuff>Slowing</> them. This ability can <Debuff>Knock Down</> flying heroes.

skills.name: Kraken Impact
skills.desc: Leap high, then dash forward and slam down with the bionic arm, dealing damage to enemies in range, marking them for <Orange>Culling</>. Marked enemies will perish instantly if their health falls below a certain threshold, recharging the bionic arm for another <Orange>Kraken Impact</> within a short period.

skills.name: Infinite Grit
skills.desc: Rocket Raccoon throws an Ammo Overload Device in the target direction. Upon entering the device's range, {101400} receive the buffs of <Buff>Infinite Ammo</> and <Buff>Faster Firing</>.

skills.name: Stellar Impact
skills.desc: Inspired by Captain America's resolve, Winter Soldier can leap to the aid of a designated ally, slamming the ground with his mechanical arm to damage nearby foes and grant <Buff>Bonus Health</> to allies within range. Captain America and Winter Soldier can interact with each other once both parties confirm. The duo then collides and unleashes a shockwave that damages and <Debuff>slows</> enemies.

skills.name: Wall Crawl
skills.desc: HOLD {Jump} to crawl on vertical surfaces.

skills.name: Cyber-web Cluster
skills.desc: Launch forward a Cyber-Web Cluster.

skills.name: Cyber-web Snare
skills.desc: Cast futuristic webbing that <Debuff>Immobilizes</> enemies or creates a <Orange>Cyber-Web</>. While in the <Orange>Cyber-Web</>, gain <Buff>Healing Over Time</> and a <Buff>Movement Boost</>. Excess healing converts into <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Bionic Spider-nest
skills.desc: Generate a <Orange>Bionic Spider-Nest</> at a targeted area, periodically spawning <Orange>Spider-Drones</> and creating <Orange>Cyber-Webs</>. While in the <Orange>Cyber-Web</>, gain <Buff>Healing Over Time</> and a <Buff>Movement Boost</>. Excess healing converts into <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Arachno-mine
skills.cooldown: 4 charges, with each charge taking 4s to recharge
skills.desc: Deploy <Orange>Arachno-Mines</> that can be concealed within the confines of a <Orange>Cyber-Web</>.

skills.name: Cyber-bond
skills.desc: Shoot a web strand that links to the targeted area or <Orange>Cyber-Web</>. If stretched too far, it will trigger a pullback.

skills.name: Spider-sweeper
skills.desc: Enhance the SP//dr suit, <Debuff>Launching Up</> enemies in its path and deploying <Orange>Arachno-Mines</>, <Orange>Spider-Drones</>, and <Orange>Cyber-Webs</> repeatedly.

skills.name: Armor Expulsion
skills.desc: Venom shares a part of his symbiotes with {103600}{000003}{104200}, activating their symbiote abilities. {103600}{000003}{104200} can convert the symbiotes into explosive spikes that inflict harm on nearby enemies and relentlessly drive them back.

skills.name: Armored Spider-nest
skills.desc: Rocket Raccoon upgrades his <Orange>B.R.B.</> by integrating the <Orange>Bionic Spider-Nest</> effect. Now, the beacon creates <Orange>Cyber-Webs</> when placed and periodically spawns <Orange>Arachno-Mines</> and <Orange>Spider-Drones</>. Peni Parker can additionally deploy an <Orange>Armored Spider-Nest</> that periodically drops <Orange>Armor Packs</> that grant <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Element Guns
skills.desc: Shoot enemies with dual Element Guns.

skills.name: Stellar Shift
skills.desc: Dodge in the direction of movement and swiftly reload. Become <Buff>Unstoppable</> and <Buff>Invincible</> while dodging.

skills.name: Rocket Propulsion
skills.desc: Consume energy to gain a <Buff>Movement Boost</> and soar forward.

skills.name: Galactic Legend
skills.desc: Engage in free-flight and lock onto enemies in sight.

skills.name: Blaster Barrage
skills.desc: Fire a frenzy of shots, causing damage to enemies within range.

skills.name: Leader's Soul
skills.desc: Adam Warlock enhances the rebirth power of {104300}{000003}{102000}, granting them the power of cocooned revival.

skills.name: LION'S LAUNCH
skills.desc: Launch the ball forward with incredible speed.

skills.name: FEROCIOUS THROW
skills.desc: Hurl the ball with fierce intensity. Charging longer enhances both speed and distance.

skills.name: ROCKET PROPULSION
skills.desc: Consume energy to gain a <Buff>Movement Boost</> and soar forward.

skills.name: LION LEAP
skills.desc: Fire bullets in all directions, launching up nearby enemies and causing them to lose the ball. This ability can only be used when not in possession of the ball.

skills.name: CELESTIAL LEAP
skills.desc: Dodge in the direction of movement and swiftly reload. Become <Buff>Unstoppable</> and <Buff>Invincible</> while dodging.

skills.name: Trident Of Neptune
skills.desc: Throw the trident forward, reducing <Orange>Aquatic Dominion's</> cooldown upon enemy impact. Critical hits cause <Orange>Monstro Spawn</> to enter a berserk state, gaining increased Attack Speed.

skills.name: Wrath Of The Seven Seas
skills.desc: Launch the trident forward to damage nearby enemies, then direct all <Orange>Monstro Spawn</> to perform an enhanced attack on the nearest hit enemy. When the trident hits an enemy, <Orange>Monstro Spawn</> to enter a berserk state, gaining increased Attack Speed.

skills.name: Blessing Of The Deep
skills.desc: Summon a protective barrier while flying upwards.

skills.name: Aquatic Dominion
skills.desc: Summon a <Orange>Monstro Spawn</> that can autonomously attack enemies.

skills.name: Horn Of Proteus
skills.desc: Summon Giganto to leap atop enemies within range, disabling their mobility abilities.

skills.name: Frozen Spawn
skills.desc: Luna Snow infuses ice energy into {104700}, who then can tap into the ice energy to power up abilities at will.

skills.name: Tide Fall
skills.desc: HOLD {Jump} to fall slowly.

skills.name: Gamma Monstro
skills.desc: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Regenerative Cocoon
skills.desc: Once his body perishes, Adam can freely move as a soul and reforge his body at a chosen spot.

skills.name: Quantum Magic
skills.desc: Launch quantum energy to deal damage. Critical hits reduce the cooldown of <Orange>Avatar Life Stream</>.

skills.name: Cosmic Cluster
skills.desc: Gather quantum energy into a cluster and then swiftly launch it at the enemy.

skills.name: Avatar Life Stream
skills.cooldown: 2 charges, with each charge taking 6s to recharge; when a critical hit lands on an enemy, reduce the cooldown time of Avatar Life Stream by 1s.
skills.desc: Target an ally for a bouncing stream of healing energy, which also heals himself upon casting; self-targets if no ally is selected.

skills.name: Soul Bond
skills.desc: Forge a soul bond with allies, granting <Buff>Healing Over Time</> and distributing damage taken across the bond.

skills.name: Karmic Revival
skills.desc: Awaken the karma of allies to revive them. Allies revived have lower health but enjoy a brief period of invincibility.

skills.name: Soul Perseverance
skills.desc: Adam Warlock enhances the rebirth power of {104300}{000003}{102000}, granting them the power of cocooned revival.

skills.name: Joyful Splash
skills.desc: Unleash a splash that damages enemies and heals allies.

skills.name: Aqua Burst
skills.cooldown: 3 charges, with each charge taking 3s to recharge
skills.desc: Launch a high-speed water sphere that bursts upon impact, dealing damage to enemies within range. Direct hits <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies.

skills.name: Healing Bubble
skills.cooldown: 3 charges, with each charge taking 6s to recharge
skills.desc: Spit a bubble that heals the ally who collects it, granting them <Buff>Healing</> and <Buff>Movement Boost</>.

skills.name: Hide And Seek
skills.desc: Dive into the scene with only his dorsal fin exposed, granting himself a <Buff>Movement Boost</>. Jeff can heal while submerged and gains the wall-crawl ability.

skills.name: It's Jeff!
skills.desc: Deep dive into the scene and resurface to swallow both enemies and allies within range, activating <Orange>Hide and Seek</> for a brief duration before ejecting the swallowed heroes forward. Excess healing converts to <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Oblivious Cuteness
skills.desc: Reduce damage taken from critical hits.

skills.name: Frozen Spitball
skills.desc: Luna Snow infuses ice energy into {104700}, who then can tap into the ice energy to power up abilities at will.

skills.name: New Friends
skills.desc: {104700}{000003}{102300} can ride on Groot's shoulders, receiving <Buff>Damage Reduction</>.

skills.name: Snow Splash
skills.desc: Unleash a damaging splash. This ability can paint the ground.

skills.name: Frost Burst
skills.desc: Launch a high-speed snowball that bursts upon impact, dealing damage to enemies within range. This ability can paint the ground.

skills.name: Blasting Bubble
skills.desc: Spit a bubble that explodes after a short delay, dealing damage; using this Ability can paint the ground.

skills.name: Hide And Seek
skills.desc: Dive into the scene with only his dorsal fin exposed, granting himself a <Buff>Movement Boost</>. Jeff can heal while submerged and gains the wall-crawl ability.

skills.name: It's Jeff!
skills.desc: Deep dive into the scene and resurface to swallow both enemies and allies within range, activating <Orange>Hide and Seek</> for a brief duration before ejecting the swallowed heroes forward. Use this ability to paint the ground.

skills.name: It's Jeff-nado!
skills.desc: When Storm unleashes her <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, if Jeff the Land Shark has <Orange>It's Jeff!</> ready, he can channel her power to conjure a ferocious <Orange>Jeff-nado</>! Additionally, a <Orange>Jeff-nado</> will form if Jeff encounters Storm's <Orange>Omega Hurricane</> after devouring enemies with <Orange>It's Jeff!</>. Enemies will be drawn into the swirling chaos after enduring sustained damage from the <Orange>Jeff-nado</> for some time.

skills.name: Guardian Of The Deep
skills.desc: Venom shares a part of his symbiotes with Jeff the Land Shark. When using the Team-Up Ability in either his normal state or during <Orange>Hide and Seek</>, Jeff extends symbiote tendrils to nearby allies, linking with them. Linked teammates receive <Buff>continuous healing</>. When the ability reaches its maximum duration, all linked allies gain a large burst of healing, with excess healing being converted into <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Psionic Crossbow
skills.desc: Unleash bolts with psionic crossbows to damage enemies and reduce the cooldowns of all her abilities.

skills.name: Wing Shurikens
skills.desc: Launch a volley of psionic shurikens that stick to enemies, dealing damage and granting herself <Buff>Bonus Health</>. Press again to recall the shurikens.

skills.name: Psi-blade Dash
skills.desc: Dash forward and slice through enemies along the path with psionic blades.

skills.name: Psychic Stealth
skills.desc: Enter stealth and gain a <Buff>Movement Boost</>.

skills.name: Dance Of The Butterfly
skills.desc: Slash nearby enemies with a psionic katana, dealing massive damage.

skills.name: Psionic Disc
skills.desc: When Magik is on the field, {102600} can tap into Limbo to rewind a few seconds back to a previous position; after passing through Limbo, {102600} will gain <Buff>Bonus Health</> based on missing health.

skills.name: Psychic Echoes
skills.desc: Emma Frost can form a mental link with Magneto and Psylocke, calling on her to create illusory projections. When together, Emma Frost will create a Mental Projection of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities on its own.

skills.name: Regenerative Healing Factor
skills.desc: Begin to heal and rise with a hefty <Buff>Bonus Health</>, shaking off all debuffs. After a brief moment, any remaining <Buff>Bonus Health</> morphs into a one-off heal, zeroing out his <Orange>Rage</>. Assists in KOs reduce this cooldown.

skills.name: Berserker Rage
skills.desc: <Orange>Rage</> builds when Wolverine attacks or takes hits, boosting the damage of his <Orange>Claw Strikes</> and the <Buff>Bonus Health</> from his regenerative healing factor.

skills.name: Savage Claw
skills.desc: Slash with Adamantium claws for a <Orange>Claw Strike</>. Unleashing <Orange>Feral Leap</> will enhance it to <Orange>Berserk Claw Strike</> for a brief period.

skills.name: Vicious Rampage
skills.desc: Dash forward and unleash a <Orange>Claw Strike</>.

skills.name: Undying Animal
skills.desc: Unleash a fierce howl to briefly reduce incoming damage.

skills.name: Feral Leap
skills.desc: Leap like an animal to snatch the first enemy upon impact and <Debuff>Smash</> them to the ground. Unleashing this ability will enhance his normal attack to <Orange>Berserk Claw Strike</> for a brief period.

skills.name: Last Stand
skills.desc: <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies ahead and spiral through the air, sweeping up enemies along the path and delivering a devastating impact at the landing point. Impact deals extra damage based on <Orange>Rage</> accumulated.

skills.name: Metal Cannonball
skills.cooldown: 3s (when Wolverine is not hurled) and 15s (after hurling Wolverine)
skills.desc: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.

skills.name: Psionic Invisibility
skills.desc: Invisible Woman automatically becomes invisible 3 seconds after disengaging from combat.

skills.name: Psionic Hammer
skills.desc: Invisible Woman unleashes a devastating three-hit combo, each blow containing concentrated power of the force fields to strike foes. The third hit will launch up enemies in front of her.

skills.name: Invisible Energy
skills.desc: When falling, Invisible Woman can perform a super jump and become invisible by pressing the space bar.

skills.name: Psionic Support
skills.desc: Invisible Woman generates a force shield in front of a selected ally. Once broken, the shield explodes to create a healing field.

skills.name: Psionic Vortex
skills.desc: Invisible Woman gathers psionic energy and throws it to create a vortex that pulls in enemies.

skills.name: Psionic Surge
skills.desc: Invisible Woman releases a cylindrical force field shockwave in the targeted direction, launching enemies up.

skills.name: Invisible
skills.desc: Channeling her potential, Invisible Woman manifests an unseen force field, rendering allies inside undetectable by enemies and healing them.

skills.name: Psionic Strike
skills.desc: Invisible Woman fires a force field that can penetrate heroes, healing any allies it passes through.

skills.name: Fantasti-force
skills.desc: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team. This formidable force bolsters {104000}{000001}{105100}{000003}{101700}, granting damage resistance. Once activated, they can continually generate <Buff>Bonus Health</>, making up for lost Health with each passing moment.

skills.name: Unyielding Will
skills.desc: Immune to <Debuff>launch-up</>, <Debuff>knock-back</>, and other displacement effects.

skills.name: Rocky Jab
skills.desc: Rapidly punch forward.

skills.name: Stone Haymaker
skills.desc: Deliver a devastating Heavy Blow.

skills.name: Yancy Street Charge
skills.desc: Continuously charge forward, <Debuff>launching up</> enemies and leaving behind a zone at the final position that prevents the use of mobility abilities.

skills.name: Embattled Leap
skills.cooldown: Basic Cooldown 3s, with a charge of 10s per use
skills.desc: Jump toward your ally and apply <Buff>damage reduction</> to both of you.

skills.name: Clobberin' Time
skills.desc: Use immense power to launch all enemies in front of you into the air.

skills.name: Cooperative Comrades
skills.desc: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team. This formidable force bolsters Human Torch, The Thing, and Mister Fantastic, granting damage resistance. Once activated, they can continually generate <Buff>Bonus Health</>, making up for lost Health.

skills.name: Cosmic Fastball
skills.desc: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.

skills.name: Wall Runner
skills.desc: Run horizontally along the walls.

skills.name: Crane Leap
skills.cooldown: 3 charges, with each charge taking 1s to recharge
skills.desc: Perform up to three consecutive jumps while airborne.

skills.name: Jeet Kune Do
skills.desc: Strike the targeted enemy with Jeet Kune Do, and the last strike will <Debuff>Launch Up</> enemies, reducing the cooldown of <Orange>Dragon's Defense</> with every hit.

skills.name: Dragon's Defense
skills.desc: Assume a defensive stance with a boost of Chi to block incoming attacks and gain <Buff>Damage Reduction</>. Once he exits the defensive stance, he gains <Buff>Bonus Health</> and can strike back with <Orange>Yat Jee Chung Kuen</>.

skills.name: Yat Jee Chung Kuen
skills.desc: Dash forward to pursue the targeted enemy and unleash a flurry of attacks.

skills.name: Harmony Recovery
skills.desc: Cross legs and channel Chi, recovering health. Excess healing converts to <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: K'un-lun Kick
skills.desc: Dash forward, delivering a flying kick when hitting an enemy or reaching full range, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Damage increases with lower enemy health.

skills.name: Living Chi
skills.desc: Become living Chi to boost his speed, damage, and attack range, delivering stronger punches while reducing the cooldown of <Orange>Dragon's Defense</>.

skills.name: Chi Absorption
skills.desc: Assists in taking down enemies allow him to absorb their Chi and gain <Buff>Bonus Health</>.

skills.name: Dragon's Chill
skills.desc: Iron Fist channels the Chi of Shou-Lao into Luna Snow, transforming her ice power into a Chi-infused frosty ring that radiates from her. This ring can launch up enemies with chilling damage and applies a slowing effect, while simultaneously healing her allies.

skills.name: LION'S LAUNCH
skills.desc: Launch the ball forward with incredible speed.

skills.name: FEROCIOUS THROW
skills.desc: Hurl the ball with fierce intensity. Charging longer enhances both speed and distance.

skills.name: CRANE LEAP
skills.cooldown: 3 charges, with each charge taking 1s to recharge
skills.desc: Perform up to three consecutive jumps while airborne.

skills.name: LION KICK
skills.desc: Sprint forward and hit the enemy or use a flying kick to launch surrounding enemies up upon reaching maximum distance, causing the enemy to lose the ball. This ability can only be used when not in possession of the ball.

skills.name: Telepathic Pulse
skills.desc: Fire a psionic beam to deal damage; the longer the beam hits, the higher the damage.

skills.name: Mind's Aegis
skills.desc: Create a levitating barrier at the designated location.

skills.name: Diamond Form
skills.desc: Activate <Orange>Diamond Form</> to transform your attack style while gaining <Buff>Damage Reduction</> and becoming <Buff>Unstoppable</>.

skills.name: Faceted Fury
skills.desc: In <Orange>Diamond Form</>, deliver a crushing double-fisted strike to enemies.

skills.name: Crystal Kick
skills.desc: In <Orange>Diamond Form</>, unleash a flying kick forward and <Debuff>knock back</> enemies; extra damage is dealt if they're propelled into a wall.

skills.name: Carbon Crush
skills.desc: In <Orange>Diamond Form</>, lunge forward to grab an enemy, then execute a back slam to inflict damage.

skills.name: Psychic Spear
skills.desc: Seize control of an enemy's sentiencedamage dealt to the <Orange>sentience</> cascades to the physical form and can be pierced by <Orange>Telepathic Pulse</>. When the sentience shatters, it unleashes extra damage on its owner.

skills.name: Psionic Seduction
skills.desc: Project a forward psychic assault that stuns foes and prevents them from unleashing their Ultimate Abilities; if the effect lingers, it gradually commandeers their mind, forcing them to move toward Emma Frost.

skills.name: Mind Link
skills.desc: Emma Frost can form a mental link with Magneto and Psylocke, calling on her to create illusory projections. When together, Emma Frost will create a Mental Projection of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities on its own.

skills.name: Cosmic Flames
skills.desc: Launch a fiery projectile forward, applying 1 Spark to enemies hit. Critical hits apply 2 Sparks. At 3 Sparks, Phoenix triggers a fiery explosion that applies 1 Spark to enemies around and Healing Over Time to self.

skills.name: Telekinesis Burst
skills.desc: Mark a targeted area with psionic energy, followed by a series of fiery explosions. The first blast Stuns enemies, while the subsequent two explosions inflict Slow. Applies 1 Spark to enemies hit.

skills.name: Dark Ascent
skills.desc: Merge with the Phoenix, entering a state of free flight. Gain a Movement Boost while continuously replenishing ammunition.

skills.name: Telepathic Illusion
skills.desc: Leave behind an illusion and instantly teleport in the desired direction, followed by detonating the illusion. Enemies hit are applied with 1 Spark.

skills.name: Endsong Inferno
skills.desc: Soar into the sky with the Phoenix and crash down onto a selected area, dealing devastating damage to enemies while creating a shockwave that destroys enemy summons, shields, and any Bonus Health. Enemies hit are applied with 1 Spark.

skills.name: Mind's Grace
skills.desc: JJean Grey imbues Wolverine with the awe-inspiring Phoenix Force. With this power, Wolverine's Feral Leap transforms into Phoenix Warrior. While active, he is enveloped in Phoenix flames that continuously scorch nearby enemies, dealing Percentage Damage. In this state, Wolverine's abilities gain Lifesteal when inflicting damage.
